title: april 24: the hubble space telescope [hosted by: Noah Kahan] (with beabadoobee)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Noah Kahan talks about the Hubble space telescope. After, he is joined by beabadoobee who talks about the anniversary of “Susie May.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
